response: Welcome to Ola's service subscription offerings. Our Ola Care and Ola Care Plus plans offer peace of mind with benefits like free labor service, theft assistance, and roadside assistance. With Ola Care Plus, enjoy additional perks like free home service, pick up and drop, and 24/7 doctor and ambulance service. We also offer an extended warranty for your Ola scooter, covering manufacturing defects for up to five years. Enhance your scooter with our accessories like center stand, buddy step, and scooter cover, and show your Ola pride with our graphic T-shirts. Purchase these easily through our website or app. Enjoy convenience, savings, and peace of mind with Ola.
title: L1.1.7 Extended Warranty, Value Added Services, Accessories and Merchandise.mp4
